teacher_info.intro:
Всем привет, меня зовут Мария, я преподаю русский язык для иностранцев. Я родилась в Сибири, выросла в Санкт-Петербурге, а сейчас живу в солнечной Греции.

Hello everyone! My name is Maria and I'm a native Russian language speaker. I graduated with honors from International Relations and in 2019 I took courses of teaching Russian as a foreign language in Pushkin State Russian Language Institute of Moscow and in the Institute for Higher Education of Minsk. For the last 4 years I've been living in Greece. I speak English, Greek and a little Spanish. I love travelling, cooking, especially baking, reading and yoga.
teacher_info.about_me:
Всем привет, меня зовут Мария, я преподаю русский язык для иностранцев. Я родилась в Сибири, выросла в Санкт-Петербурге, а сейчас живу в солнечной Греции.

Hello everyone! My name is Maria and I'm a native Russian language speaker. I graduated with honors from International Relations and in 2019 I took courses of teaching Russian as a foreign language in Pushkin State Russian Language Institute of Moscow and in the Institute for Higher Education of Minsk. For the last 4 years I've been living in Greece. I speak English, Greek and a little Spanish. I love travelling, cooking, especially baking, reading and yoga.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I'm a fan of communicative approach to language teaching, because as I understood from my own experience, the best and the fastest way to learn foreign language is to use it in real world situations. As a teacher I'm very patient, polite and supportive, so don't worry about possible mistakes. I understand that learning a foreign language can be a very challenging process, so I'm here to help you to make it an enjoyable one. I'm ready to work with adults of all levels.
teacher_info.teaching_style: As a Community Tutor first of all I'm focused on a conversation practice and we can talk about huge range of topics. But I'm also ready to help you with grammar and to improve your writing and reading skills as well. So, our lessons will be organized according to your needs, goals and motivation. During our lessons I will use authentic materials to help you to achieve fluency and after each lesson I will send you a summary of the studied material. I think that self-learning is also very important, so I can give a homework if you want.
teacher_info.interest: Due to family emergency I stop to accept requests for new lessons.
teacher_info.offline_reason: Due to family emergency I stop to accept requests for new lessons.

course_info.trial_description: My Trial Lesson is a normal lesson. But first I will ask some simple questions to get to know you and to understand better your language level and motivation. It will help me to prepare future classes for you. You can ask me anything you would like to find out about me and my teaching methods. And after we will choose some topic to discuss and will do some exercises.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring

pro_course_detail.title: Business Russian Course
Conversational Russian

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Valeria. My native language is Russian, but I speak fluent English as I have a massive everyday practice with my husband who is native British. I love traveling, reading books and watching series and movies, so I’m sure we will find lots in common! 
Меня зовут Валерия. Я свободно разговариваю на 2 языках- Русском и Английском. Русский- мой родной язык, Английский был мечтой, которую я воплотила в реальность, выучив до высшего уровня. Теперь я замужем за коренным Британцем, и ежедневной практики в английском у меня даже больше, чем я себе могла когда-то представить. Я обожаю путешествовать, читать книги, смотреть фильмы, сериалы, поэтому я уверена что мы найдём с Вами много общего.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I'm not a proffesional teaher, but i've learned English myself and i know what a hard adventure learnng a new language is. I will be happy to share my favourite methods of studing and help you with everything i can, but my most prefarable way of learning is constant practise, so on these lessons we will talk a lot (it doesn't matter how rich your vocabulary is). At the moment I’m on maternity. Although my son will go kindergarten very soon, I want to assure you he won’t be disturbing us from education.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I will be happy to work with adults and children of different ages and nationalities. On my lessons we will talk and improve your English and Russian speaking skills. We will organize our work the way we can both enjoy our lessons, and you can always choose the topics you’d like to discuss. Let’s start speaking and have fun together! 
Я буду рада работать с детьми и взрослыми разных возрастов и национальностей. На наших уроках мы будем много общаться и повышать Ваши навыки владения языками. Мы организуем нашу с Вами работу так, чтобы мы оба наслаждались обучением, и Вы всегда можете выбрать те темы, которые Вам захочется со мной обсудить. Давайте начнём разговаривать и весело проводить время

course_info.trial_description: Hello everyone! If you find Russian or English languages very interesting to learn and speak-  then this lesson is exactly what you need. My main goal is to make our lessons simple, funny and productive at the same time. In this lesson you'll be able to choose your own comfortable way of learning. Any topics you find interesting will be discussed together in very friendly and easy going vibes. I truly believe that one of the best ways of learning a language is speaking as much as possible, and that's exactly what we will do together

pro_course_detail.description: This lesson will be good for anybody who just wants to talk and imrove his Englsih speaking skills. We will be discussing different topics, describing pictures and learn general words  that everybody needs in everyday life

I am making a special program for business, communication, travel and education. Our lessons will be easy, interactive and fun. The most important thing for me is that the student feels comfortable and enjoy learning.

I developed a new method of teaching Russian with practical and easy way from zero level to upper. (From English, Turkish and Azeri languages).
This teaching method provides ease of understanding and pronunciation of phrases, more conversations in teaching, which is compiled individually for each student, depending on his level and desire for development. I also use Callan method for teaching.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, friends! I'm Ekaterina. I was born and live in Russia. I've been teaching the Russian language for more than 10 years. I graduated from South Ural State university  in teaching Russian and editing and then from Moscow State university in teaching Russian as a foreign language. 
Всем привет! Меня зовут Екатерина. Я родилась и живу в России. Я преподаю русский язык более 10 лет и являюсь дипломированным преподавателем русского языка как иностранного.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi, friends! I'm Ekaterina. I was born and live in Russia. I've been teaching the Russian language for more than 10 years. I graduated from South Ural State university  in teaching Russian and editing and then from Moscow State university in teaching Russian as a foreign language.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I was teaching Russian in 2006-2007 in South Ural State university, and at the same I was a literary editor of magazin "Delovoy kvartal" up to the end of 2008. And since 2009  I'm a private teacher of Russian. I know how to learn the Russian language easily, interestingly( with fun), effectively. 
Я преподавала русский язык в Южно-Уральском государственном университете в 2006-2007 и одновременно работала литературным редактором в журнале "Деловой квартал" до 2008 года. С 2009 года я начала давать частные уроки. Я знаю, как выучить русский язык легко, непринужденно и в тоже время очень эффективно.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I work with beginners, intermediate or advanced learners. As for the individual approach, I pick up a programme for studing and select efficient methods personally for everyone in accordance with your preferences or the level of Russian.  I use a variety of methods at lessons, not only books. 
Я работаю как с начинающими, так и со студентами среднего и продвинутого уровней. Программу изучения я подбираю в зависимости от ваших предпочтений и уровня языковой подготовки. Каждый урок я стараюсь сделать максимально полезным и интересным для каждого студента. Я использую не только учебники, мы также будем читать книги и статьи, смотреть видео, слушать песни, обсуждать новости, писать письма.

exp_info.description: За время работы в журнале я очень подробно работала с тонкостями и нюансами русского языка, авторскими стилями и композицией текстов. Это позволило мне еще глубже изучить русский язык.
Опыт преподавательской деятельности позволил составить необходимые программы для каждого уровня владения русским языком.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everybody!
My name is Irina, I am from Moscow and currently living in Milan, Italy.

I graduated from Moscow State Linguistic University in 2010. My passion has always been teaching. After having graduated, I started my teaching career at the same university and also at Moscow State University.
In 2016 I got the certificate of teaching Russian to foreigners. In 2020 I got CELTA certificate (pass A).
My teaching experience is more than 10 years and I offer lessons of Russian and English to young learners, teenagers and adults of all levels.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everybody!
My name is Irina, I am from Moscow and currently living in Milan, Italy.

I graduated from Moscow State Linguistic University in 2010. My passion has always been teaching. After having graduated, I started my teaching career at the same university and also at Moscow State University.
In 2016 I got the certificate of teaching Russian to foreigners. In 2020 I got CELTA certificate (pass A).
My teaching experience is more than 10 years and I offer lessons of Russian and English to young learners, teenagers and adults of all levels.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have learnt 5 foreign languages and I know exactly how it feels to learn a foreign language. I try to open a new world for all my students, and, obviously, I think that studying process is impossible without a good sense of humour. I support my students and do my best to make them feel really comfortable during our classes.

Я сама выучила пять иностранных языков, и прекрасно знаю, что это такое - быть студентом и изучать новый язык. Я стараюсь открыть новую культуру и новы мир своим студентам, конечно же, я считаю, что процесс обучения невозможен без хорошей доли чувства юмора. Я поддерживаю своих студентов и делаю всё возможное, чтобы процесс обучения был максимально приятным.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching methods vary and are based on students' needs and goals. I also take into consideration students' motivation, background and type of learners.
Regarding learning materials, here I also take into account a lot of factors and always try to combine all the aspects of studying the language.

Мои методы преподавания зависят от целей студентов. Учитываю также их мотивацию, потребности и уровень.
В том что касается учебных материалов, подбираю их также на основе потребностей и целей студента и всегда сочетаю разные аспекты в изучении языка.

exp_info.description: Ho avuto quasi 9 anni di esperienza di insegnare agli studenti di diversi livelli e diverse fasce d'età.

cert_info.description: Il requisito era la conoscenza della lingua al livello di C2, mi abilita ad insegnare la lingua inglese agli stranieri in tutto il mondo.
Mi abilita ad insegnare la lingua russa agli stranieri

course_info.trial_description: During our first meeting we get to know each other, students share their needs, desires, goals and I explain my teaching methods, focusing on the individual approach towards each type of learner. The second half of the class we have some practice activities.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for all levels - Русский для всех уровней - Russo per tutti I livelli - Russe pour tous les niveaux - Ruso para todos los niveles
pro_course_detail.description:

La mia esperienza di insegnamento è di più di 10 anni e offro lezioni di russo a bambini, adolescenti e adulti di tutti i livelli.
I miei metodi di insegnamento sono diversi e si basano sui bisogni e sugli obiettivi degli studenti. Prendo anche in considerazione la motivazione e il background degli studenti.
Per quanto riguarda i materiali di apprendimento, qui prendo in considerazione anche molti fattori e cerco sempre di combinare tutti gli aspetti dello studio della lingua.

Mon expérience d'enseignement est de plus de 10 ans et je propose des cours de russe à de jeunes apprenants, adolescents et adultes de tous niveaux.
Mes méthodes d'enseignement varient et sont basées sur les besoins et les objectifs des étudiants. Je prends également en compte la motivation des étudiants.
En ce qui concerne les supports d'apprentissage, ici je prends en compte de nombreux facteurs et j'essaie toujours de combiner tous les aspects de l'étude de la langue.

Mi experiencia docente cuenta más de 10 años y doy lecciones de ruso a jóvenes estudiantes, adolescentes y adultos de todos los niveles.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian - exam preparation / Русский язык - подготовка к экзаменам / Russo - preparazione di esami / Russe - préparation aux examens / Ruso - preparación a los exámenes
pro_course_detail.description:
My teaching experience is more than 10 years and I offer lessons of Russian to young learners, teenagers and adults of all levels, preparing as well for all important exams in Russian such as ТРКИ and others.
My teaching methods vary and are based on students' needs and goals. I also take into consideration students' motivation, background and type of learners.
Regarding learning materials, I have an access to all the database of the recent exams, helping my students to understand and improve their weak areas.

Мой опыт преподавания - более 10 лет. В данный момент преподаю частным образом, онлайн и оффлайн всем возрастным группам и уровням, включая подготовку к наиболее важным экзаменам по русскому языку (например, ТРКИ).
Мои методы преподавания зависят от целей студентов. Учитываю также их мотивацию, потребности и уровень.
В том что касается учебных материалов, я пользуюсь базой данных экзаменационных материалов прошлых лет, таким образом помогая студентам определить и улучшить их слабые места.

La mia esperienza di insegnamento è di più di 10 anni e offro lezioni di russo ad adulti di tutti i livelli, incluso la preparazione degli esami di russo più importanti come ТРКИ e gli altri.
I miei metodi di insegnamento sono diversi e si basano sui bisogni e sugli obiettivi degli studenti. Prendo anche in considerazione la motivazione e il background degli studenti.
Per quanto riguarda i materiali di apprendimento, dispongo del database delle prove di esami, il quale uso per aiutare i miei studenti ad identificare ed eliminare le loro lacune.

Mon expérience d'enseignement est de plus de 10 ans et je propose des cours de russe à adultes de tous niveaux, compris la préparation des examens de russe les plus importants, comme ТРКИ et autres.
En ce qui concerne le matériel d'apprentissage, j'ai la base des tests d'examen, que j'utilise pour aider mes étudiants à identifier et à éliminer leurs lacunes.

teacher_info.teaching_style: ¡Hola a todos! ¡Recibe una calurosa bienvenida desde Rusia! Me presento, mi nombre es Aygul y soy hablante nativa de ruso y tártaro. Soy filóloga hispánica y profesora de ruso para extranjeros también. Disfruto enseñar, es algo que me apasiona. Por eso, si deseas aprender ruso, me gustaría ayudarte a mejorar tus habilidades en mi lengua materna y a que conozcas un poco más de la rica y diversa cultura de mi país.

course_info.trial_description:
На пробном занятии мы познакомимся с методикой обучения, и я отвечу на интересующие Вас вопросы. Также мы обсудим Ваши цели и пожелания, на основе которых я составлю программу занятий.
En la clase de prueba nos conocemos la metodología y le contesto a sus preguntas. Además, me va a contar sus objetivos y deseos, a partir de los cuales crearé el plan de estudios.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский для начинающих (Ruso básico para principiantes)
pro_course_detail.description:
На нашем занятии мы познакомимся с алфавитом и основными фразами. Также мы будем отрабатывать произношение и попробуем составить диалоги, используя пройденную лексику
En la clase vamos a ver el abecedario ruso y las frases básicas. Además, trabajaremos con la pronunciación y trataremos de hablar usando el léxico que hemos aprendido.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика (La práctica oral)
pro_course_detail.description:
Постановка произношения. Практика монологической и диалогической речи. Чтение с последующим разбором. Обсуждение на основе видео и аудио материалов.
Corrección de errores de pronunciación. Práctica de conversaciones (monólogo/diálogo). Lectura con el análisis. Debate en base a audios y videos.

pro_course_detail.title: Деловое общение (Сomunicación empresarial)
pro_course_detail.description:
1) Как написать резюме? (¿Cómo escribir el currículum vitae?)
2) Как подготовиться к собеседованию? (¿Cómo preparse para una entrevista de trabajo?)
3) Специализированая лексика (Vocabulario especializado)
4) Деловой этикет (Etiqueta empresarial)

pro_course_detail.title: Curso de pronunciación en ruso
pro_course_detail.description:
El curso está dirigido a estudiantes de ruso que deseen mejorar su pronunciación. 
Los objetivos de curso:
1) ver el funcionamiento de la base articulatoria del ruso
2) trabajar con la pronunciación de sonidos en sílabas, palabras y oraciones
con una entonación correcta y comprensible 
3) abordar las dificultades que se sulen presentar a los extranjeros que aprender ruso

Everything that seemed difficult before we can do in this class. Let's get out of a comfort zone and expand your knowledge about Russian!

teacher_info.introduction:
My name is Juliya. As an ambitious language coach I am deeply interested in your progress. I use latest methods and effective techniques.My native languages are Ukrainian and Russian. We can check the level of these languages .Improve your speaking, writing skills and your knowledge of grammar, increase the vocabulary . My method of teaching Russian/Ukrainian as a foreign language is based on communicative approaches and combine learning common expressions used in everyday situations with thorough and systematic grammatical approach. This is of vital importance for learning a language like Russian or Ukrainian.

 If you need my help or have any questions please feel free to contact me! 

Non-attendance policy: If you are late for a lesson, I will wait for you 15 minutes. If you are more than 15 minutes late, the lesson will not take place, but you will still need to pay for it.
CANCELLATION POLICY: 24-hour notice is needed for lessons to be cancelled. If less than 24-hour notice is given, it will still be necessary for you to pay for the lesson, as I will be unable to give your lesson time to another student

Please feel free to check my Instagram page Learn Ukrainian https://www.instagram.com/ukrainian_language/

During my classes I encourage students to use the language as much as possible no matter which level they are at. I find a topic for discussion that can be interesting for my student, which can be discussed prior the class. The main focus I try to put on collocations and spoken phrases to help a student sound natural as well as understand the natives.
Depending on my students' requests we can practice reading and writing as well as pronunciation.
But the most important for me is the atmosphere! I believe that learning a language has to be a pleasant and fun journey.

course_info.trial_description: General Russian language speaking practice. Small talk practice. Student's requested topic discussion. Общая практика разговорного русского языка. Познакомимся и попрактикуем обсуждение повседневных тем или темы, интересной для студента

Need to practice general conversation or small talk? We will focus on that.
If you need some help from a native speaker on a specific subject, we will make this our priority.
For this kind of class I provide pdf files with vocabulary of the class as well as interesting articles that might be a nice basis of our discussions if needed

teacher_info.intro: Hi! I am glad to welcome you to my page. My name is Aleksa or Sasha, whichever is convenient for you. I live in Moscow, Russia. I am a Bachelor of journalism and a native speaker of Russian. Now I am getting a second higher education at the Faculty of Law, and also taking professional retraining courses on the topic of teaching Russian as a foreign language.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi! I am glad to welcome you to my page. My name is Aleksa or Sasha, whichever is convenient for you. I live in Moscow, Russia. I am a Bachelor of journalism and a native speaker of Russian. Now I am getting a second higher education at the Faculty of Law, and also taking professional retraining courses on the topic of teaching Russian as a foreign language.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I'am an enthusiastic teacher of Russian as a foreign language, because the Russian language and its features have interested me since childhood. I am sure that learning Russian should be an exciting adventure, not a painful torture! I regularly work to make my lessons interactive, fun and interesting. I always take into account the goals pursued by the student and his interests. My lessons are adapted and individualized for each person. I study foreign languages myself, so I know well how the educational process should be structured to have succeed! I have a lot of tutorials for different levels. All of them are modern, colorful and built in accordance with all standards.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I use only Russian in my classes. If there is an urgent need, I explain some points in English. But in any case, I am for immersion in the language environment.
In the lessons I use educational materials of different formats - tests, videos, audio, articles. And something so that my students like very much.... Do you want to know what is it? So I'm waiting for you in class!

pro_course_detail.description: First I conduct testing to determine your level. Next, you tell me what level you would like to reach. I am selecting an individual program for you. It is important for me that you achieve great results in the shortest possible time.

teacher_info.intro:

teacher_info.intro: Hello. My name is Anna. I am currently an art student and my the biggest hobby is studying foreign languages.  I like getting acquaintance with new people which belong to different cultures.

I will help you to understand the speech, I will show you how to start Russian dialogues, I will teach you how to make  sentences and of course we will get acquaintance with the alphabet!
teacher_info.teaching_style: At the beginning of every our lesson I will send you the grammar material and exercises. We will be having friendly conversations and I guess it's also the way to know new facts for you about Russian culture!

pro_course_detail.title: General
pro_course_detail.description: In this lessons you will get a little bit of conversation practice and we also dedicate the time to work on the grammar part. This lesson is also for you if you have the certain questions.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone and welcome to my profile!

teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone and welcome to my profile!
My name is Vasila, I come from Montenegro, where I have been teaching English and 2 other foreign languages for the last 8 years.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I will try to do my best to fit your needs according to lesson duration, frequency and your devotion to the task. At the end of a lesson, you are very likely to be given homework to make sure you absorbed all the teaching material. Revising is absolutely the most important when it comes to languages.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
When it comes to my teaching style, I speak slowly and intelligibly and this is the main reason I consider myself a good interlocutor, but a skilled and patient listener too. 
It is my pleasure to see my students asking for help whenever they need it.

course_info.trial_description:
Welcome to my trial lesson!

In this class, your knowledge will be assessed, and you will get a learning plan made just for you. Whatever needs improving -- be it grammar, vocabulary, or speech -- it can be fixed with patience and persistence and there is no obstacle we can't overcome.

On the other hand, if there is a concept you can't seem to grasp and you'd like it to be clarified in a trial lesson, please let me know in advance by dropping me a message.

I can't wait to get to know you and I'm sure we'll have lots of fun during your English learning journey!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description:
Solidify your knowledge and improve your verbal fluency by engaging in spontaneous, real time conversation!

These lessons are usually casual and informal. We can decide on a topic beforehand – or you can leave it up to me to pick an interesting subject for us to talk about. After the lesson ends, you will receive a document containing all the new words and phrases.

Also, expect homework -- but don't worry, it won't be that difficult! Students usually have to write a short essay, or complete an exercise. Homework is not daunting and is of great use to students!

pro_course_detail.title: English Vocabulary and Grammar
pro_course_detail.description: In case you need to freshen your theoretical knowledge, vocabulary and grammar lessons will be of great help. These classes are the gateway to effortless communication and expressive speech – and are often overlooked!

pro_course_detail.title: German Grammar, Reading and Writing
pro_course_detail.description: Ein ständiges Lernen wird dir helfen, dich auf Deutsch auszudrücken und die Sprache gut zu verstehen.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational German
pro_course_detail.description: Egal aus welchem Grund du die deutsche Sprache lernst, Sprechen ist eine der wichtigsten Phasen im Unterricht.

pro_course_detail.title: Serbian Grammar, Reading and Writing- часови граматике на српском

teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Anastasiia. I live in Ukraine and teach English, Russian, and Ukrainian online. I am a passionate language learner and now I'm learning my 4th language(Korean) because I believe that talking to a person in their own language is the best way to get to know them.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi! My name is Anastasiia. I live in Ukraine and teach English, Russian, and Ukrainian online. I am a passionate language learner and now I'm learning my 4th language(Korean) because I believe that talking to a person in their own language is the best way to get to know them.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Not only am I a qualified English teacher but also I am a native Russian and Ukrainian speaker. I love these languages for their beauty and melody. I enjoy having lessons with people from all over the world and I really appreciate the opportunity to share my knowledge with others. My goal is to teach students how to speak confidently and not to be afraid of making mistakes. (Because even native speakers often make them :) )
teacher_info.teaching_style: I assign homework after every class (to write an essay, to watch and comment on a video, to record a student's own audio podcast, etc.). All my lessons are customized in order to meet my students' needs. If they travel a lot, we practice every possible situation that may happen to them abroad. If they need to get ready for the interview or test, we make up our own strategies and pay attention to the most challenging parts. If they want to improve their overall understanding, we focus on real-life vocabulary and grammar.

course_info.trial_description: During trial lesson, we'll get a chance to get to know each other, discuss your learning goals, and have a small talk

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Ukrainian
pro_course_detail.description:
На уроках розмовної української ми будемо складати речення, які вам знадобляться в реальному житті; покращимо вашу вимову, побудуємо словниковий запас і вивчимо основні правила відмінювання дієслів та іменників. При цьому, це все буде відбуватися через обговорення різноманітних тем і питань
****
We'll make up sentences in Ukrainian, improve your pronunciation, build up essential vocabulary and learn conjugation rules through conversation.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
На занятиях мы будем обсуждать различные темы, которые вам интересны, будем описывать картинки и записывать свои собственные аудиоподкасты. Так же я буду отправлять вам домашнее задание, чтобы у вас была возможность лучше запомнить пройденный материал.
****
We'll practice conversations in Russian, describe pictures, discuss various topics(from Art and Music to Psychology) and make our own podcasts. Also, you will get assignments.

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description: We will do lots of grammar exercises, watch videos, read and analyze texts during our classes. While reading we won't be translating but explaining unknown words instead. It will help you to build up the vocabulary and get used to making sentences faster.

pro_course_detail.title: General(Reading,Listening,Pronunciation) Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот курс для тех людей, кто хочет улучшить общее понимание текстов и речи. Мы будем читать текст или смотреть видео на русском а потом его обсуждать, чтобы: 1) убедиться, что все было понятно; 2) попрактиковать говорение; 3) повторить новые слова и грамматические конструкции. 
***
This course is for those people who want to improve their overall text and speech understanding. We will read texts and watch videos(movies) in Russian. After that we'll discuss the material to: 1) make sure that everything's clear; 2) practice speaking skills; 3) go over new words and grammar patterns.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Kids
pro_course_detail.description: We'll be learning English through flashcards (animals, vegetables, parts of the body, colors, etc.), games, cartoons, and songs. There will be LOTS of repetitions so that a child can memorize and practice words and sentences faster and easier.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello. Thank you for reading my teacher profile!
My name is Natalia. I'm from Russia. Russian is my native language. I'm also fluent in English. I have experience living in Europe and China. I love languages both teaching and learning them.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello. Thank you for reading my teacher profile!
My name is Natalia. I'm from Russia. Russian is my native language. I'm also fluent in English. I have experience living in Europe and China. I love languages both teaching and learning them.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
- If you are a foreigner and are learning Russian, I'm here to help you. I've been teaching Russian for 4 years. Don't worry if you're a beginner or an advanced student, I'll create a lesson plan that fits your needs.

- If you are looking for an English teacher for your child, I'd love to be that teacher. I've been teaching English to children for 3 years now. I've lived in China and worked with Chinese children. I love it.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
- In my Russian lessons I like using general words, phrases and other things that you use on a daily basis. This is a great way to start. 

- In my English lessons I'll use flash cards, books, and activity sheets and most importantly, I'll try and make each class fun and enjoyable for the child.

I look forward to meeting you or your child in my class.
Have a nice day!

course_info.trial_description:
You have nothing to lose, just try a 30-minute trial lesson with me and see if you like it or not. You can ask me any question you want.

And don't forget that language is a skill that gives you many benefits. See you in class!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
If you're a beginner in learning Russian, I'll be happy to teach you. If you already speak a little Russian, that's great too, we'll improve it quickly.

In my lessons I give you a sentence, then ask a question, you can repeat and practice your Russian in an easy way. 

My approach is to teach you as a child, so you'll have fun and you won't be afraid of Russian. Hope to see you soon in a class!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's communicate in Russian. I'm here for you. Don't worry, I'll help you speak in class. I usually tell short stories to help you improve your listening comprehension. And I ask a lot of questions.

Only practice, practice and practice will make your Russian better!
Pick a day and time, and the first step is taken. See you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: English Lessons for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description: I would welcome the opportunity to help you with English. I've been teaching and improving English for more than 4 years. I've also worked in China as an English teacher.

teacher_info.intro:
Всем привет! Меня зовут Катя. Родилась на юге России, в настоящее время живу в Москве. Работаю администратором в школе фламенко. В свободное время люблю сходить в кино, на концерт  или в клуб с друзьями. I can't live without music and dancing. Salsa, son cubano, tango, flamenco are my life. Also i like cinema - author's (Allen, Lynch, Jarmusch, Tarkovsky.  I am open-minded and unprejudiced person.
Hablo en castellano y lo sigo mejorando. Me enamoré de esa lengua  cuando tenia clases de tango con maestros de Argentina. Y esto cambió mi vida. Ya no puedo imaginarme sin mis amigos  hispanohablantes y sin las canciones  de Buena Vista)

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я очень люблю родной русский язык. У меня есть только опыт помощи  с русским языком моим друзьям. Но я работала тьютором в сети кофеен в Москве - и могу сказать , что была как наставник   лояльна и очень терпелива, но требовательна.
I do not have a big experience of teaching Russian, but I have worked as a tutor in a chain of coffee shops for a long time and I also have many foreign friends whom I help with Russian. As a tutor I am patient but demanding.
Como tutor de ruso solo tengo experiencia  con m,is amigos. Pero mucho tiempo trabaje como tutor en una cadena de  cafeterias. Tengo paciencia, empatía y percepción.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мой стиль преподавания  пока не сложился. Но я руководствуюсь  опытом ведущих преподавателей русского как иностранного и использую современные учебники и методы.
I continue to work on creating my style. For me, the main thing is that learning a language will be interesting and  not boring. 
Todavia sigo buscando mi propio estilo. Pero para mi lo más importante es que nuestra comunicación sea viva y no aburrida.

course_info.trial_description:
Всем привет! Друзья! Приглашаю на пробный урок по русскому языку.  Для меня это прежде всего знакомство с вами просто как с новым человеком, даже не в контексте знаний по русскому языку. Важно  почувствовать  общую энергетику, атмосферу,  и просто заглянуть друг другу в глаза.  Что-то типа пилотной серии) До встречи!
Hola a todos! Os quiero invitar al clase de prueba de ruso.  Para conocernos en personas  y para sentir el ambiente común. Nos vemos!
Hello friends! I invite you to a pilot - lesson! See you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
Как и в случае с любым другим языком, русский невозможен без базовой грамматики. Необходимая основа - это  алфавит, чтение по слогам и далее к простым разговорным  фразам. Мне приятно будет стать  вашим проводником в мир русской культуры. Кто знает, может быть вы более тонко осмыслите фильмы Тарковского, зная его родной язык и русский менталитет)
Quién no ha deseado en su vida leer Dostoevskyi o Dovlatov en original? Es posible! Pero ...hay que empezar con el alfabeto)
As Confucius said "The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.  Russian is difficult. But we will start from alphabet and phrases for traveling to Russia. Step by step all is possible!
